/>
Introduction
This topic contains general information about proposed ratings, including
when to prepare a proposed rating
preparing proposed and final actions
providing
a due process period
, and
notice
preparing a rating and providing notice under the proper regulations
new rating decisions based on new evidence
preparing a new rating decision following receipt of additional evidence
, and
preparing and sending a final rating decision
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section D - Completing Proposed Rating Decisions
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section D
